publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Published date is according to Lady Day dating.
Dated at end of text: Given at our court at VVhitehall the ninth day of February, in the fourteenth yeer of Our reign.
Steele notation: Arms 24 and to 2) late 3) Seale 4) alwayes at.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
